Event: ... rather than outdated & bigoted at worst, and outdated, patronising, imperialist, monoculturalist & self-righteous at best.
Post:
"I failed my job interview, which means I'm destined to be a failure in every aspect of my life."

Note: This post attributes the cause of failing a job interview to the individual's entire life, implying that they are doomed to fail in everything they do. It is an example of a global attributional style because it takes a single event (failing a job interview) and extrapolates it to the individual's whole life, assuming a broad scope of negative consequences.
